description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) Details of new lintel to ground-floor front window opening and making good works including stucco / render material composition and paint finish; b) Elevation (1:5), section (1:2) and moulding (1:1) detail of new ground-floor front window, including sample of glazing or details of supplier and methodology of works including making good. Window to be double hung sliding sash in white painted timber with through glazing bars, bevelled putty finish and no trickle vents; c) Reflected ceiling plans showing areas of retained and new cornice and retained and new lighting; d) Details showing proposed build-up of floors and walls for the bathrooms and shower rooms, to include retained / proposed walls, and surface covering, in section (1:5); e) Elevation (1:20) showing relationship with existing or new cornice and proposed shower enclosures; f) Details of all new internal doors, architraves, linings and fixings, in elevation (1:10), section (1:5) and mouldings (1:1) along with a plan clearly showing door locations and a schedule setting out locations and materials and finishes. Doors to be traditionally jointed stile and rail) of Listed Building consent LB/24/05320 (Retrospective application for previous alterations carried out at number 49 and 49a (lower ground floor) identified under CL/24/01005; as well as proposed new works on the ground floor: Restoration of the original spine wall that separated the front and rear rooms; restoration of the original cornices to the front and rear rooms; relocation of internal front door, which has been brought forward into the flat and is no longer in line with the entrance corridor wall; restoration of the front window to its original height and style, to match neighbouring properties; fitting of additional bathrooms adjacent to the restored spine wall; reinstatement of the original ceiling height in the central section of the property; and reinstatement of the original chimney breast in the front room)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Ground Floor Flat, 49 Sydney Street, LONDON, SW3 6PX
